_sText:
I present to you, surf_like_this

Tier 2/3 | Linear | 4 Bonuses | 40 Player Spawns (T Only)

This is a space themed map, inspired heavily from Natural Selection 2.
I'm also using some assets from their game with a bit of adjustments.
The surfing is inspired by mwag's maps, such as surf_porn.

It's a tier 2/3 map (3 because of the lenght), but it's very forgivin, and easy to figure out if you try.
The map is a linear type, has 4 bonuses, and about 40 playerspawns. All stages has a trigger_multiple added at the start & end for server owners to use, just remember to 'Enable' them.

It has been tested with default velocity (and is made for such) with 150/300 airaccelerate.

Hope you enjoy!
CS:GO Version is here: https://gamebanana.com/maps/208263

Unpack the .rar file here:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps
